verses.verse: When you go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than <S%H3372>you,<s%> you shall not be afraid of <S%H3068>them;<s%> for Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H5927>you,<s%> who brought you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
It shall <S%H7126>be,<s%> when you draw near to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

and shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H8085>them,<s%> "Hear, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you draw <S%H7131>near<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> <S%H3824>don't<s%> let your heart <S%H7401>faint;<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid, nor <S%H2648>tremble,<s%> neither be <S%H6206>scared<s%> of <S%H6440>them;<s%>
for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he who <S%H1980>goes<s%> with <S%H3898>you,<s%> to fight for you against your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> to save <S%H3467>you.<s%>"

The <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What <S%H376>man<s%> is there who has <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and has not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> <S%H3212>it?<s%> Let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> dedicate <S%H2596>it.<s%>

What <S%H376>man<s%> is there who has <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and has not <S%H2490>used<s%> its <S%H3212>fruit?<s%> Let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> use its <S%H2490>fruit.<s%>

What <S%H376>man<s%> is there who has pledged to be <S%H781>married<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and has not <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3212>her?<s%> Let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> take <S%H3947>her.<s%>"

The <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "What <S%H376>man<s%> is there who is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390>fainthearted?<s%> Let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%> as his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>"

It shall <S%H7860>be,<s%> when the officers have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
When you draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7121>it,<s%> then proclaim peace to <S%H7965>it.<s%>

It shall <S%H6030>be,<s%> if it makes you answer of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H6605>opens<s%> to <S%H5971>you,<s%> then it shall be, that all the people who are <S%H4672>found<s%> therein shall become <S%H4522>tributary<s%> to <S%H5647>you,<s%> and shall serve you.
If it will make no <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> but will make <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H6696>you,<s%> then you shall besiege it:

and when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivers<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> you shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H2138>male<s%> of it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword:<s%>

but the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and all that is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even all its <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> you shall <S%H962>take<s%> for a prey to <S%H398>yourself;<s%> and you shall eat the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you.<s%>

Thus you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> from <S%H2007>you,<s%> which are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> you shall save <S%H2421>alive<s%> nothing that <S%H5397>breathes;<s%>

but you shall <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H2850>them:<s%> the Hittite, and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has commanded <S%H6680>you;<s%>

that they not <S%H3925>teach<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> after all their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to their <S%H430>gods;<s%> so would you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

When you shall <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> in making <S%H3898>war<s%> against it to <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H7843>it,<s%> you shall not destroy its <S%H6086>trees<s%> by <S%H5080>wielding<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> against <S%H398>them;<s%> for you may eat of <S%H3772>them,<s%> and you shall not cut them down; for is the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> that it <S%H935>should<s%> be besieged of <S%H6440>you?<s%>

Only the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of which you <S%H3045>know<s%> that they are not <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> you shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and cut them <S%H3772>down;<s%> and you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H3381>you,<s%> until it fall.
